description: Complete system overview covering the license management architecture, key components, and their interactions
Detailed documentation of license types, their attributes, states, and relationships with hardware fingerprints and user accounts
Technical details of the hardware fingerprinting algorithms, including CPU ID, motherboard serial, and MAC address collection and hashing
Comprehensive documentation of the multi-step license validation process, including local cache verification, hardware binding, and server-side validation
Detailed mapping of data flow between client-side validation, server-side management, and license state transitions
